nodes.text: Koss was a gas giant–type planet with eight moons that was located in the Faarlsun system, a part of the Parthovian Cluster in Wild Space. The planet occupied the fifth orbit around its star, the yellow-white Faarlsun.

Koss was mentioned in the 1993 sourcebook Wanted by Cracken, written by Louis J. Prosperi for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Faarlsun system, and therefore Koss, in grid square T-4.
